latest_revision.text:
See also: [[MSDS Index]]

==HeatSync Labs MSDS Binder==
When bringing a chemical or potentially-hazardous material into the lab, please search the Internet for and print out an MSDS. 
* Add it to this binder in alphabetical order by product name. 
* Add the item to the Chemical Name Index and Company Name Index pages (in pen, or by printing a new copy.)
* Update the “last updated” date below (in pen is fine.)
* Extra sheet protectors should be stored nearby, possibly in another binder. 
* Insert two sheets per protector to save space.
* This document stored at: http://wiki.heatsynclabs.org/wiki/MSDS_Binder

LAST UPDATED:
